subs.text: üìö Fooled by hindsight bias. This one is for anyone who thinks lockdowns and school closures in the spring of 2020 were a mistake. Making ex post ‚Äúpredictions‚Äù is infinitely easier than ex ante, and gives you a false sense of confidence to boot. Dangerous and stupid. [link]

subs.text: Give a lecture once and you help a few hundred people (if you‚Äôre lucky). Post the lecture to YouTube and you help millions. 7 years later, I am yet to find a better guide to academic writing. NB: it‚Äôs good to have a live audience. [link]
